name: GitHub Advanced Security (GHAS)
description: GitHub's native security suite — Dependabot, CodeQL code scanning, and secret scanning alerts
setup_steps: 1. Create a GitHub PAT (classic) with scopes: security_events, repo
2. Or use a fine-grained PAT with: Dependabot alerts (read), Code scanning alerts (read), Secret scanning alerts (read)
3. Set GITHUB_OWNER to your org name
4. GHAS must be enabled on the target repositories
security_notes: Use fine-grained PATs scoped to specific repos where possible
Read-only access is sufficient — no write permissions needed
PAT expiry: set to 90 days maximum
Do not use a PAT with admin:org scope
